name: Nicole Wittauer
what_you_do: Nicole Wittauer is a facilitator, coach, artist and holistic practitioner who bridges the mystical and the practical, translating complex concepts into simple and creative visuals.
who_you_serve: Individuals, groups, and teams looking to step into clarity, creativity, and the freedom to play the game of life fully.
social_proof: Nicole has received positive testimonials from various clients, including Barbara Lax (award-winning entrepreneur), Morgan Matthews (consultant & coach), Maria Pulido-Svensson (business strategist), Paddy Ney (TV host), Tanya Strevens (sustainability expert), and Sam Cook (serial entrepreneur).
business_focus: Helping individuals, groups, and teams step into clarity, creativity, and the freedom to play the game of life fully.
